text:
i own 7 months ago " Ather Rizta (3.7 kwh + pro pack)  1,78,000/- on road

13,000 km done 
2 sarvice done (1st= 670 , 2nd= 770)

Not any single problem in scooter . I went go to the service center only twice for normal every 5000 km servicing.

Single seat ( my weight 88 kg )
Eco mode Range = 110 to 120 km 
Zip mode Range= 90 to 100 km

Double seat range drop to around 10km both mode

Charge 0 to 100% = 5hr 50min to 6hr10min

Pros - 
1) Build quality 8.5/10
2) Magic Twist very effective. Im using braks only 20 to 30 %  so breaks life longer.
3) Autohold work awesome
4) Skid control is also very effective
5) Showing remaining renge & battery percentage is very accurate.
5) Charging infrastructure setups 
6) Ather Application very useful

Cons -
1) Headlight 5/10 . In full blackout area when 90¬∞ turn front of you then you will not be able to see anything through the headlights, you will have to use your eyes then.
2) Display navigation lags sometimes.
3) Range
